Brief description: Artificially generated data describing the structure of 10 capital English letters.
Preprocessing: Coordinates of lines drawn given as integers. Various other features.
Creator: H. Guvenir et al.

Preprocessing: 17 features are extracted from all images.
Creator: D. Slate et al.

Brief description: Offline handwritten Chinese character database. 3755 classes in the GB 2312 character set.
Preprocessing: Gray-scaled images with background pixels labeled as 255.
Creator: CASIA

Brief description: Online handwritten Chinese character database, collected using Anoto pen on paper. 3755 classes in the GB 2312 character set.
Preprocessing: Provides the sequences of coordinates of strokes.
Creator: CASIA

Brief description: Labeled samples of pen tip trajectories for people writing simple characters.
Preprocessing: 3-dimensional pen tip velocity trajectory matrix for each sample
Creator: B. Williams

Brief description: Character recognition in natural images of symbols used in both English and Kannada
Default Task: Character recognition, handwriting recognition, OCR, classification
Creator: T. de Campos

Preprocessing: Coordinates of pen position as characters were written given.
Creator: F. Prat et al.

Brief description: Handwriting samples from the often-confused 4 and 9 characters.
Preprocessing: Features extracted from images, split into train/test, handwriting images size-normalized.
Creator: Yann LeCun et al.

Brief description: 1623 different handwritten characters from 50 different alphabetss.
Creator: American Association for the Advancement of Science
National Institute of Standards and Technology

Dataset Name: Optical Recognition of Handwritten Digits Dataset
Preprocessing: Size normalized and mapped to bitmaps.
Creator: E. Alpaydin et al.

Dataset Name: Pen-Based Recognition of Handwritten Digits Dataset
Preprocessing: Feature vectors extracted to be uniformly spaced.
Creator: E. Alpaydin et al.

Preprocessing: All handwritten digits have been normalized for size and mapped to the same grid.
Creator: T. Srl

Preprocessing: All symbols are centered and of size 32px x 32px.
Creator: Martin Thoma

Brief description: Includes Handwritten Numeral Dataset (10 classes) and Basic Character Dataset (50 classes), each dataset has three types of noise: white gaussian, motion blur, and reduced contrast.
Preprocessing: All images are centered and of size 32x32.
Creator: M. Karki et al.
